## Meeting.updateAudio() method

Update the main audio track with new parameters

NOTE: this method can only be used with transcoded meetings, for multistream meetings use publishTrack()

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateAudio(options: {
        sendAudio: boolean;
        receiveAudio: boolean;
        stream: MediaStream;
    }): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { sendAudio: boolean; receiveAudio: boolean; stream: MediaStream; } |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;
